Common provides an exceptional work environment, driven by incredibly passionate and intelligent employees. Everybody works hard and is respectful of each other's talents, time, and sensibilities. Unlike the stereotypes of a typical start-up, there's a real respect for work-life balance, and the company is driven by true work ethic and a belief that we're providing for the future of housing in cities, with no ego coming into play.
